msbt.message: Today is the Lunar New Year, isn't it? Surely that explains why I'm feeling a sense of inner calm, .
Today is the Lunar New Year, you know. I do hope you have a fabulous new year, !
I hear that today is the Lunar New Year. I suppose that means we get to celebrate the new yearagain? Well, , I think that's wonderful! You know me. I LOVE any excuse to dress up.
Are you enjoying the Lunar New Year, ?I never tire of events like this. Celebrating with friends keeps us young and vibrant. Or so I read.
My goodness, but I'm in such a festive mood. And it's all because today is the Lunar New Year! Hmm I should be sure to share this celebratory feeling with everyone. You should too, !
